methods.name: public Builder putString(String key, String value)
methods.comment:
* Put a String value into the meta data. Custom keys may be used, but if * the METADATA_KEYs defined in this class are used they may only be one * of the following: *
    *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_RDS_PS}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_RDS_RT}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_TITLE}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_ARTIST}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_ALBUM}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_GENRE}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_COMMENT_SHORT_DESCRIPTION}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_COMMENT_ACTUAL_TEXT}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_COMMERCIAL}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_HD_STATION_NAME_SHORT}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_HD_STATION_NAME_LONG}
    • *
* * @param key The key for referencing this value * @param value The String value to store * @return the same Builder instance

methods.name: public Builder putInt(String key, int value)
methods.comment:
* Put an int value into the meta data. Custom keys may be used, but if * the METADATA_KEYs defined in this class are used they may only be one * of the following: *
    *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_RDS_PI}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_RDS_PTY}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_RBDS_PTY}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_HD_SUBCHANNELS_AVAILABLE}
    • *
* or any bitmap represented by its identifier. * * @param key The key for referencing this value * @param value The int value to store * @return the same Builder instance

methods.name: public Builder putBitmap(String key, Bitmap value)
methods.comment:
* Put a {@link Bitmap} into the meta data. Custom keys may be used, but * if the METADATA_KEYs defined in this class are used they may only be * one of the following: *
    *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_ICON}
    • *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_ART}
    • *
*

* * @param key The key for referencing this value * @param value The Bitmap to store * @return the same Builder instance

methods.name: public Builder putClock(String key, long utcSecondsSinceEpoch, int timezoneOffsetMinutes)
methods.comment:
* Put a {@link RadioMetadata.Clock} into the meta data. Custom keys may be used, but if the * METADATA_KEYs defined in this class are used they may only be one of the following: *
    *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_CLOCK}
    • *
* * @param utcSecondsSinceEpoch Number of seconds since epoch for UTC + 0 timezone. * @param timezoneOffsetMinutes Offset of timezone from UTC + 0 in minutes. * @return the same Builder instance.

methods.name: public Builder putStringArray(@NonNull String key, @NonNull String[] value)
methods.comment:
* Put a String array into the meta data. Custom keys may be used, but if * the METADATA_KEYs defined in this class are used they may only be one * of the following: *
    *
  • {@link #METADATA_KEY_UFIDS}
    • *
* * @param key The key for referencing this value * @param value The String value to store * @return the same Builder instance * @throws NullPointerException if key or value is null * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key is not string-array-type key

methods.name: public RadioMetadata build()
methods.comment:
* Creates a {@link RadioMetadata} instance with the specified fields.
         *
         * @return a new {@link RadioMetadata} object

methods.name: private Bitmap scaleBitmap(Bitmap bmp, int maxSize)
